txt.en: DNT - 'Stealing cubs is almost lower than poison traps.'
Linnet Redholm sets a challenge to hunt the Wildwood's fiercest and rarest game.
The great beasts can be found across the Wildwood. \n\nLinnet has asked you to defeat the White Stag Gwengorn, the Great Boar Brundurch, the Black Elk DÃºgar, and the Silver Warg Lhudblath.
'Amazing work, friend. I might even admit that you are a better hunter than myself. ...One day.'
Defeat the fabled beasts of the Wildwood

'Our friends here tell of mighty beasts that roam the Wildwood, some attacking all in their path with wanton abandon. I have tracked a few of them and feel confident their behaviour is not natural. Whatever sickness has driven these animals to such violence must not be spread to the rest of the forest.\n\n'I came here seeking glory, but I am wise enough to know when I am outmatched. If you take down the sickened creatures, I will ensure the bards know your name.'
Linnet can be found in the central Wildwood.\n\nYou should return to Linnet.
